predict_diagnosis:
1. congenital heart disease with complex congenital heart defects, such as hypoplastic left heart syndrome or transposition of the great vessels
2. advanced stage liver cirrhosis with portal hypertension and epigastric variceal bleeding
3. primary biliary cholangitis (PBC) with secondary progressive liver failure and右心功能不全
4. rhabdomyolysis with myoglobinuria and acute kidney injury
5. congenital adrenal hyperplasia (CAH) with salt and water retention leading to hyponatremia
6. hemolytic uremic syndrome (HUS) with evidence of microangiopathic hemolytic anemia, thrombotic microangiopathy, and renal dysfunction
7. biliary tract cancer with liver metastasis and cholangitis
8. acute pancreatitis secondary to gallstones and alcohol abuse
9. sepsis with systemic inflammatory response syndrome (SIRS) and hypotension
10. primary hypothyroidism with myelofibrosis and右心功能不全
